title: Duo RANKED
body:
I am looking for a mature player to complete my provisional ranked queue with.
Open to anyone with a fair knowledge of the game and takes ranked seriously.
ADD ME
IGN: BroFistCommander

Looking forward to playing with you!

replies.body:
Hi!

You will get a lot more replies if you include some basic details about yourself.
For instance, what role you like to play most and your previous seasons' ratings :)
As well as availability to play and voice chat programs you use (if any).

Good luck.
